div.h1: Eye Clinic - Optical Shop Management System
div.p: Easy to manage your optical shop and eye clinic in one system

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

img.alt: Optical Shop System for Eyewear Inventory
img.title: Optical Shop System for Eyewear Inventory

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

div.p: Optical management system is specially designed for managing your eyewear products and eye clinic with inventory, invoices, sales and customer also. System allows you to manage your customer details, their order history. Letâ€™s deep dive into the system's features.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

div.p: This system allows you to manage your eyewear products with detail levels like, frame type, color, range, materials, gender wise, trendy etc.. it allows for the management of a price list based on various offers, making it easy to handle prices for different product variants. Managing inventory is quite easy with a product master. Also you can manage products with your multi stores.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

img.alt: Optical Shop System for Scheduling and Billing
img.title: Optical Shop System for Scheduling and Billing

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

img.alt: Optical Shop System for Customer Service and Sales
img.title: Optical Shop System for Customer Service and Sales

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

div.p: Here you have smart control for customer profile management, where you can manage customerâ€™s sales, appointments, checkup, follow ups and so on.
Also, Send personalized emails, SMS, and notifications to customers, keeping them informed about their orders, promotions, and other important updates.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

div.p: The optical system includes a smart sales system that allows you to manage your sales with highly configurable price list options, send quotations via email with custom templates, follow up, create meetings in sales orders, and add log notes for follow-ups. Additionally, there is a beautiful customer portal. In the portal, customers can track invoices and sales orders, and chat with sales representatives.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

img.alt: Optical Shop System for Sales and Customer Records
img.title: Optical Shop System for Sales and Customer Records

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 mx-auto d-block col-md-12 col-12

div.p: You'll get a confirmation email from us soon, letting you know we've received your request and started working on it.
Our solution advisor will review your needs and get back to you within 2 business days.
If needed, we can sign a mutual NDA within 1 business day to keep everything confidential.
Our business development manager will share an initial project estimate or recommendations within 2-4 days.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

img.alt: Optical Shop System for Retail Workflow and Client Experience
img.title: Optical Shop System for Retail Workflow and Client Experience

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

div.p: Every business has one main focus, which is purchasing. The optical system also includes a purchase management solution that allows you to track your purchase orders by vendor, vendor-specific product prices, RFQ double approval process, vendor profile master, etc.

div.h2: Unlock the Full Potential of Your Optical Business
